definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Amicus Plato Amicus Aristotle, send Magis Amicus Veritas .
sentences.chinese: 柏拉圖，亞里士多德傳授以馬吉斯真理。

sentences.english: We cannot trust all people, Aristotle seems to say.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能信任所有的人，亞里士多德似乎這麼說。

sentences.english: Again, for Aristotle, by contrast, art presupposes nature.
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德不同，自然高於藝術。

sentences.english: Aristotle tells us that slavery is natural.
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德告訴我們奴役是自然的演變。

sentences.english: And it takes you through to the Aristotelian theory.
sentences.chinese: 然後回顧亞里士多德的理論。

sentences.english: The question is what did Aristotle mean by slavery?
sentences.chinese: 問題是亞里士多德所謂的奴役爲何？

sentences.english: Fan Li and Aristotle are respectively politicians in ancient Chinaand Greece.
sentences.chinese: 范蠡和亞里士多德是古代中國和古希臘的兩大政治家。

sentences.english: So how did the Aristotelians deal with that ?
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德哲學如何處理這個問題呢？

sentences.english: Aristotle founded his own school, the lyceum.
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德創建了自己的流派，叫作學園派。

sentences.english: What were Aristotle's own political beliefs?
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德自己的政治信念爲何？

sentences.english: Aristotle's whole conception of poetics theory is creationary imitation.
sentences.chinese: 創造性模仿是亞里士多德詩學理論中的核心概念。

sentences.english: The foundation-stone of persuasive speech is what Aristotle in the 4th century BC described as the "ethos" appeal.
sentences.chinese: 勸說式演講最早爲公元前4世紀亞里士多德時期的。

sentences.english: Saint Thomas's position is that of Aristotle.
sentences.chinese: 聖托馬斯的立場和亞里士多德的立場一樣。

sentences.english: It's as true now as it was in the time of Aristotle.
sentences.chinese: 遠在亞里士多德的年代亦同。

sentences.english: Common ownership, Aristotle argues, will mean a sort of common neglect.
sentences.chinese: 亞里士多德論及，共同所有權等同於一種共同的疏漏。

sentences.english: I want to begin today with concluding Aristotle part3.
sentences.chinese: 我今天要以總結亞里士多德第三部曲收尾。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
